title: Better diagnostics for trait impl method return value lifetimes not matching trait definition

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-suggestion-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: suggestions generated by the compiler applied by cargo fix

labels.name: D-newcomer-roadblock
labels.description: Confusing diagnostic error hard to understand for new users

body:
Given the following code:

```rust
impl AsRef<dyn Session> for Conn {
    fn as_ref(&self) -> &dyn Session {
        match &self.conn {
            Inner::Client(c) => c,
            Inner::Server(c) => c,
        }
    }
}

impl AsMut<dyn Session> for Conn {
    fn as_mut(&mut self) -> &mut dyn Session {
        match &mut self.conn {
            Inner::Client(c) => c,
            Inner::Server(c) => c,
        }
    }
}
```

They ran into an error:

```rust
error: `impl` item signature doesn't match `trait` item signature
   --> src/connection.rs:32:5
    |
32  |     fn as_ref(&self) -> &dyn Session {
    |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ found `fn(&Conn) -> &dyn Session`
    | 
   ::: /home/jsha/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/convert/mod.rs:158:5
    |
158 |     fn as_ref(&self) -> &T;
    |     ----------------------- expected `fn(&Conn) -> &(dyn Session + 'static)`
    |
    = note: expected `fn(&Conn) -> &(dyn Session + 'static)`
               found `fn(&Conn) -> &dyn Session`
    = help: the lifetime requirements from the `impl` do not correspond to the requirements in the `trait`
    = help: verify the lifetime relationships in the `trait` and `impl` between the `self` argument, the other inputs and its output

error: `impl` item signature doesn't match `trait` item signature
   --> src/connection.rs:41:5
    |
41  |     fn as_mut(&mut self) -> &mut dyn Session {
    |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ found `fn(&mut Conn) -> &mut dyn Session`
    | 
   ::: /home/jsha/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/convert/mod.rs:199:5
    |
199 |     fn as_mut(&mut self) -> &mut T;
    |     ------------------------------- expected `fn(&mut Conn) -> &mut (dyn Session + 'static)`
    |
    = note: expected `fn(&mut Conn) -> &mut (dyn Session + 'static)`
               found `fn(&mut Conn) -> &mut dyn Session`
    = help: the lifetime requirements from the `impl` do not correspond to the requirements in the `trait`
    = help: verify the lifetime relationships in the `trait` and `impl` between the `self` argument, the other inputs and its output
```

Playground with solved error: https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=ae11922513a1e7935cad64df43dc68a5.

It seems reasonable that the error could suggest the solution in this case.

cc @estebank @jsha @icing
